alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued January 16 at 4:17AM ChST until January 19 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND DRY CONDITIONS WILL LEAD TO RAPID FIRE SPREAD... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT FOR A HIGH WIND EVENT... The National Weather Service in Tiyan has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Wednesday morning through late Thursday night. * WIND...Sustained northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 50 mph possible. * HUMIDITY...As low as 50 to 55 percent in the afternoons. * HIGHEST THREAT...Southern parts of Guam, especially areas with extensive sun and wind exposure. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A fire weather watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible red flag warnings.
